mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON_REVIEW( REVIEW_ID, TEACHER_ID, STUDENT_ID, LESSON_ID, REVIEW, REVIEW_DATE, LESSON_TITLE ) SELECT REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{teacherId}, #{studentId}, #{lessonId}, #{review}, sysdate FROM LESSON L INNER JOIN TEACHER T ON L.LOGIN_ID = T.LOGIN_ID WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId} AND T.LOGIN_ID = #{teacherId}
mapper.select: SELECT STUDENT_ID, TEACHER_ID, a.LESSON_ID, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW, (SELECT LESSON_TITLE FROM LESSON WHERE LESSON_ID = a.LESSON_ID) AS LESSON_TITLE FROM LESSON_REVIEW a INNER JOIN lesson b ON a.lesson_id = b.lesson_id where TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
